enumeratedValues.name: KRE_0
enumeratedValues.description: Row is not included in the keypad key press detect.

enumeratedValues.name: KRE_1
enumeratedValues.description: Row is included in the keypad key press detect.

enumeratedValues.name: TOTEM_POLE
enumeratedValues.description: Column strobe output is totem pole drive.

enumeratedValues.name: OPEN_DRAIN
enumeratedValues.description: Column strobe output is open drain.

enumeratedValues.name: KPKD_0
enumeratedValues.description: No key presses detected

enumeratedValues.name: KPKD_1
enumeratedValues.description: A key has been depressed

enumeratedValues.name: KPKR_0
enumeratedValues.description: No key release detected

enumeratedValues.name: KPKR_1
enumeratedValues.description: All keys have been released

enumeratedValues.name: KDSC_0
enumeratedValues.description: No effect

enumeratedValues.name: KDSC_1
enumeratedValues.description: Set bits that clear the keypad depress synchronizer chain

enumeratedValues.name: KRSS_0
enumeratedValues.description: No effect

enumeratedValues.name: KRSS_1
enumeratedValues.description: Set bits which sets keypad release synchronizer chain

enumeratedValues.name: KDIE_0
enumeratedValues.description: No interrupt request is generated when KPKD is set.

enumeratedValues.name: KDIE_1
enumeratedValues.description: An interrupt request is generated when KPKD is set.

enumeratedValues.name: KRIE_0
enumeratedValues.description: No interrupt request is generated when KPKR is set.

enumeratedValues.name: KRIE_1
enumeratedValues.description: An interrupt request is generated when KPKR is set.

enumeratedValues.name: INPUT
enumeratedValues.description: ROWn pin configured as an input.

enumeratedValues.name: OUTPUT
enumeratedValues.description: ROWn pin configured as an output.

enumeratedValues.name: INPUT
enumeratedValues.description: COLn pin is configured as an input.

enumeratedValues.name: OUTPUT
enumeratedValues.description: COLn pin is configured as an output.
